page.shortlink: gridproperties miscellaneous date picker month names property
page.description: Specify the month names to be shown when the pop-up date picker is used. Enter a comma separated list.
page.tip: You can also set the month names in this special session variable: *[xb:session.__protected__datePickerMonthNames]*

section.title: Automatically Setting Month Names Based on the User's Locale

description.p: You can specify that the month names should be dynamically computed based on the user's locale by setting the *[ui:Date picker - month names]* property to <cultureDayNames>. This makes it easier to build applications that seamlessly adapt based on the user's locale setting.

see.ref: Setting the Date Format Based on the User's Locale
